name: Bookmarks Toolbar — selective favicons
description:
"Faviconize" selected* bookmarks on your toolbar. 
Works fine with style 7706, style 5546 (although using it with this would be redundant), and probably other similar styles as well.

Replaces a few favicons with data URI images.

I intend to use this as a template, and anyone should personalize it as much as they want.
In fact, I encourage all you Stylish users to take this and run with it. ;-) 
Customize your Bookmarks Toolbar with your own icons: put it on userstyles.org as a "favicon theme."


----- NO LONGER UPDATED - USE AT YOUR OWN RISK -----
additional_info:
To see some examples of favicons, take a look at these sites:
 » http://www.fineicons.com/en/favicon-gallery
 » http://www.convertico.com/
 » http://www.favicon.cc/

A comment, written by user 552 for style 5969, helped me with this a bit, so I guess I -could- thank user 552 for the tip, even if he wasn't actually talking to me. :P
————————————————————————————————————
* Any bookmark can be added to this style; the ones included are examples, since I wouldn't know each user's site preferences or tastes. Just do a Find + Replace of one of the sites included, and put in your own bookmark name.

Updates: 
5-12-10 - cleaned up margins a bit better (for Vista-Aero theme; other themes will vary)
